title: Battery draining & battery health
content:
I bought pixel 4a just 4 days back and I can see that battery drains very very fast in normal usage , I'm getting almost 5 hours of screen time only.
Also I noticed that In battery usage section I found that it says FULL CHARGE LAST UPTO 10 HOURS 15 MINUTES
Is this normal or it's a defective battery , please reply soon because I have only few days left to claim replace of product from Google.
I'm attaching screenshots
